Name: Great Mughal Martini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE raisins in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Douglas' original recipe called for raisin infused boubon and I'd recommend you make this drink that way if time permits.
History: Created in 2001 by Douglas Ankrah for Red Fort, Soho, London, England.
